name: ResizePluginOptions
description: Application options for the {@link ResizePlugin}. These options control how your application handles window and element resizing. ```ts // Auto-resize to window await app.init({ resizeTo: window }); // Auto-resize to container element await app.init({ resizeTo: document.querySelector('#game') }); ```

properties.name: resizeTo
properties.description: Element to automatically resize the renderer to. ```ts const app = new Application(); await app.init({ resizeTo: window, // Resize to the entire window // or resizeTo: document.querySelector('#game-container'), // Resize to a specific element // or resizeTo: null, // Disable auto-resize }); ```

properties.type:
Auto-resize to window
 * await app.init({ resizeTo: window })

Auto-resize to specific element
 * const container = document.querySelector('#game-container')

Change resize target at runtime
 * app.resizeTo = window

properties.name: options
